appearance.description: Friendly middle-aged man with warm brown skin and kind, gentle eyes. Short dark beard with some gray showing he's experienced. Wears simple blue and cream robes. Often holds a wooden shepherd's staff. Has a calm, patient expression.
distinguishingFeatures: Short beard with touch of gray
appearance.continuityNote: MUST look identical across all parashiyot from Shemot through Devarim. Same face, same robes, same staff.

personality.childFriendlyDescription: Moses is a caring leader who helps everyone. He's humble (doesn't brag) and very brave. He always listens carefully before acting.

staff.description: Simple wooden shepherd's staff, slightly curved at top
staff.when: Most scenes where Moses is leading or doing something important
